page.title: 16BRILL CLUBS FOR ALL AGES.
page.content: There are 15 different clubs in Brill for all ages.The Sports and Social Club organises social events and village home games including hockey,football, cricket and rounders.Cubs in Brill is organised by a leader,Akela.They meet at 6.15pm.on Tuesdays.Boys can join between 8 and 11 and may then move on to scouts in Oakley.Brownies is held at 6pm.each Monday.Girls may join between 7 11 years,then they can go on to guides at Long Crendon.Lunch club meets once a month on a Friday.It provides a good home cooked meal for the elderly. The playgroup is held on each weekday morning for two and a half hours.It is for children between 3 and 5 years old. Other clubs are youth club,patchwork evening,Brill Peace Group,Brill Society,British Legion,toddlers group and Women's Institute.
